title: ACC vs. SEC is prominent in stacked field at Dick's Sporting Good Collegiate Challenge Cup.
content:
Lee McCoy, shown during the 2015 Men's NCAA Championship at The Concession in Bradenton, Fla ( Tracy Wilcox ) Bragging rights are on the line this week at the Dick’s Sporting Goods Collegiate Challenge Cup. Six schools representing the Atlantic Coast Conference and six from the Southeastern Conference will meet for the third straight year at the Tom Fazio-designed Golf Club of Tennessee outside of Nashville. “We really want to go to high-level courses that really challenge our guys, and Golf ... 
 Read the full article
